TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit WindowsPrincipal extends System.Security.Claims.ClaimsPrincipal

summary.span: 允许代码检查 Windows 用户的 Windows 组成员身份。

span.span: Enables code to check the Windows group membership of a Windows user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类主要用于检查 Windows 用户的角色。The class is primarily used to check the role of a Windows user. 方法重载使你可以使用不同的角色上下文检查用户角色。The method overloads let you check the user role by using different role contexts. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用方法重载。The following example demonstrates how to use the method overloads. 枚举用作标识内置角色的相对标识符 (rid) 的源。The enumeration is used as the source for the relative identifiers (RIDs) that identify the built-in roles. Rid 用于确定当前主体的角色。The RIDs are used to determine the roles of the current principal. [!code-cpp[System.Security.Principal.WindowsBuiltInRole Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Principal.WindowsBuiltInRole Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.Principal.WindowsBuiltInRole Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Principal.WindowsBuiltInRole Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Principal.WindowsBuiltInRole Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Principal.WindowsBuiltInRole Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 确定当前主体是否属于指定的 Windows 用户组。

span.span: Determines whether the current principal belongs to a specified Windows user group.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法有四个重载。There are four overloads for this method. 出于性能原因, 强烈建议使用重载。For performance reasons, the overload is strongly recommended. > [!IMPORTANT] > Windows 98 或 windows Millennium Edition 不支持此方法。The method is not supported on Windows 98 or Windows Millennium Edition.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool IsInRole(int32 rid) cil managed
Public Overridable Function IsInRole (rid As Integer) As Boolean

param.name: rid
param.span: Windows 用户组的 RID，在该用户组中检查主体的成员资格状态。

span.span: The RID of the Windows user group in which to check for the principal's membership status.

summary.span: 确定当前主体是否属于具有指定相对标识符 (RID) 的 Windows 用户组。

span.span: Determines whether the current principal belongs to the Windows user group with the specified relative identifier (RID).

returns.span: 如果当前主体是指定的 Windows 用户组的成员（即在特定的角色中），则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the current principal is a member of the specified Windows user group, that is, in a particular role; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 测试新创建的角色信息 (如新用户或新组) 时, 注销并登录以强制在域内传播角色信息非常重要。When testing for newly created role information, such as a new user or a new group, it is important to log out and log in to force the propagation of role information within the domain. 不这样做可能会导致测试返回。 `false`Not doing so can cause the test to return `false`. Windows 98 或 Windows Millennium Edition 不支持此方法。This method is not supported on Windows 98 or Windows Millennium Edition. 出于性能原因, 建议重载重载, 作为确定用户角色的首选重载。For performance reasons, the overload is recommended as the preferable overload for determining the user's role. > [!NOTE] > 在 Windows Vista 中，用户帐户控制 (UAC) 决定用户的特权。In Windows Vista, User Account Control (UAC) determines the privileges of a user. 如果您是内置的 Administrators 组的成员，将为您分配两个运行时访问令牌：一个标准用户访问令牌和一个管理员访问令牌。If you are a member of the Built-in Administrators group, you are assigned two run-time access tokens: a standard user access token and an administrator access token. 默认情况下，您拥有标准用户角色。By default, you are in the standard user role. 当您尝试执行需要管理特权的任务时, 您可以使用同意对话框动态提升您的角色。When you attempt to perform a task that requires administrative privileges, you can dynamically elevate your role by using the Consent dialog box. 执行方法的代码不显示 "同意" 对话框。The code that executes the method does not display the Consent dialog box. 如果你是标准用户角色, 则该代码将返回 false, 即使你处于内置 Administrators 组中也是如此。The code returns false if you are in the standard user role, even if you are in the Built-in Administrators group. 通过右键单击应用程序图标并指示你希望以管理员身份运行, 可以在执行代码之前提升权限。You can elevate your privileges before you execute the code by right-clicking the application icon and indicating that you want to run as an administrator. 相对标识符 (Rid) 是 Windows 用户组的安全标识符 (SID) 的组件, 受支持以帮助防止跨平台本地化问题。Relative identifiers (RIDs) are components of a Windows user group's security identifier (SID) and are supported to help prevent cross-platform localization issues. 许多用户帐户、本地组和全局组的默认 RID 值在所有 Windows 版本中都是固定的。Many user accounts, local groups, and global groups have a default RID value that is constant across all versions of Windows. 例如, BUILTIN\Administrators 角色的 RID 为0x220。For example, the RID for the BUILTIN\Administrators role is 0x220. 如果当前主体是管理员, 则使用 0x220 作为方法`true`的输入参数会导致返回。Using 0x220 as the input parameter for the method results in `true` being returned if the current principal is an administrator. 下表列出了默认 RID 值。The following tables list the default RID values. |内置用户Built-in users|去掉RID| |---------------------|---------| |DOMAINNAME\AdministratorDOMAINNAME\Administrator|0x1F40x1F4| |DOMAINNAME\GuestDOMAINNAME\Guest|0x1F50x1F5| |内置全局组Built-in global groups|去掉RID| |-----------------------------|---------| |DOMAINNAME\Domain 管理员DOMAINNAME\Domain Admins|0x2000x200| |DOMAINNAME\Domain 用户DOMAINNAME\Domain Users|0x2010x201| |DOMAINNAME\Domain 来宾DOMAINNAME\Domain Guests|0x2020x202| |内置本地组Built-in local groups|去掉RID| |----------------------------|---------| |BUILTIN\AdministratorsBUILTIN\Administrators|0x2200x220| |BUILTIN\UsersBUILTIN\Users|0x2210x221| |BUILTIN\GuestsBUILTIN\Guests|0x2220x222| |BUILTIN\Account 运算符BUILTIN\Account Operators|0x2240x224| |BUILTIN\Server 运算符BUILTIN\Server Operators|0x2250x225| |BUILTIN\Print 运算符BUILTIN\Print Operators|0x2260x226| |BUILTIN\Backup 运算符BUILTIN\Backup Operators|0x2270x227| |BUILTIN\ReplicatorBUILTIN\Replicator|0x2280x228| ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示方法的用法。The following code example demonstrates the use of the methods. 枚举用作标识内置角色的 rid 的源。The enumeration is used as the source for the RIDs that identify the built-in roles. Rid 用于确定当前主体的角色。The RIDs are used to determine the roles of the current principal. [!code-cpp[System.Security.Principal.WindowsBuiltInRole Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Principal.WindowsBuiltInRole Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.Principal.WindowsBuiltInRole Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Principal.WindowsBuiltInRole Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Principal.WindowsBuiltInRole Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Principal.WindowsBuiltInRole Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 唯一标识 windows 2000、windows Server 和 windows XP 实现上的用户或组。The uniquely identifies a user or group on Windows 2000, Windows Server, and Windows XP implementations. 测试新创建的角色信息 (如新用户或新组) 时, 注销并登录以强制在域内传播角色信息非常重要。When testing for newly created role information, such as a new user or a new group, it is important to log out and log in to force the propagation of role information within the domain. 不这样做可能会导致测试返回。 `false`Not doing so can cause the test to return `false`. Windows 98 或 Windows Millennium Edition 不支持此方法。This method is not supported on Windows 98 or Windows Millennium Edition. > [!NOTE] > 在 Windows Vista 中，用户帐户控制 (UAC) 决定用户的特权。In Windows Vista, User Account Control (UAC) determines the privileges of a user. 如果您是内置的 Administrators 组的成员，将为您分配两个运行时访问令牌：一个标准用户访问令牌和一个管理员访问令牌。If you are a member of the Built-in Administrators group, you are assigned two run-time access tokens: a standard user access token and an administrator access token. 默认情况下，您拥有标准用户角色。By default, you are in the standard user role. 当您尝试执行需要管理特权的任务时, 您可以使用同意对话框动态提升您的角色。When you attempt to perform a task that requires administrative privileges, you can dynamically elevate your role by using the Consent dialog box. 执行方法的代码不显示 "同意" 对话框。The code that executes the method does not display the Consent dialog box. 如果你是标准用户角色, 则该代码将返回 false, 即使你处于内置 Administrators 组中也是如此。The code returns false if you are in the standard user role, even if you are in the Built-in Administrators group. 通过右键单击应用程序图标并指示你希望以管理员身份运行, 可以在执行代码之前提升权限。You can elevate your privileges before you execute the code by right-clicking the application icon and indicating that you want to run as an administrator. 出于性能原因, 这是确定用户角色的首选重载。For performance reasons, this is the preferable overload to determine a user's role. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示方法的用法。The following code example demonstrates the use of the method. 枚举值用于确定当前主体是否为管理员。The enumeration value is used to determine whether the current principal is an administrator. 有关完整的代码示例, 请参见方法。For the full code example, see the method. [!code-csharp[System.Security.Principal.WindowsBuiltInRole Example#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Principal.WindowsBuiltInRole Example/CS/source.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Principal.WindowsBuiltInRole Example#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Principal.WindowsBuiltInRole Example/VB/source.vb#5)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 测试新创建的角色信息 (如新用户或新组) 时, 注销并登录以强制在域内传播角色信息非常重要。When testing for newly created role information, such as a new user or a new group, it is important to log out and log in to force the propagation of role information within the domain. 不这样做可能会导致测试返回。 `false`Not doing so can cause the test to return `false`. Windows 98 或 Windows Millennium Edition 不支持此方法。This method is not supported on Windows 98 or Windows Millennium Edition. 出于性能原因, 建议重载重载, 作为确定用户角色的首选重载。For performance reasons, the overload is recommended as the preferable overload for determining the user's role. > [!NOTE] > 在 Windows Vista 中，用户帐户控制 (UAC) 决定用户的特权。In Windows Vista, User Account Control (UAC) determines the privileges of a user. 如果您是内置的 Administrators 组的成员，将为您分配两个运行时访问令牌：一个标准用户访问令牌和一个管理员访问令牌。If you are a member of the Built-in Administrators group, you are assigned two run-time access tokens: a standard user access token and an administrator access token. 默认情况下，您拥有标准用户角色。By default, you are in the standard user role. 当您尝试执行需要管理特权的任务时, 您可以使用同意对话框动态提升您的角色。When you attempt to perform a task that requires administrative privileges, you can dynamically elevate your role by using the Consent dialog box. 执行方法的代码不显示 "同意" 对话框。The code that executes the method does not display the Consent dialog box. 如果你是标准用户角色, 则该代码将返回 false, 即使你处于内置 Administrators 组中也是如此。The code returns false if you are in the standard user role, even if you are in the Built-in Administrators group. 通过右键单击应用程序图标并指示你希望以管理员身份运行, 可以在执行代码之前提升权限。You can elevate your privileges before you execute the code by right-clicking the application icon and indicating that you want to run as an administrator. 对于内置角色, `role`字符串应采用 "内置\\RoleNameHere" 格式。For built-in roles, the `role` string should be in the form "BUILTIN\\*RoleNameHere*". 例如, 若要测试 Windows 管理员角色中的成员身份, 表示角色的字符串应为 "BUILTIN\Administrators"。For example, to test for membership in the Windows administrator role, the string representing the role should be "BUILTIN\Administrators". 请注意, 可能需要转义反斜杠。Note that the backslash might need to be escaped. 下表列出了内置角色。The following table lists the built-in roles. > [!NOTE] > 采用字符串格式的内置角色的拼写与枚举中使用的拼写不同。The spelling for the BUILTIN roles in string format differs from the spelling used in the enumeration. 例如, 枚举中的管理员拼写为 "管理员", 而不是 "Administrators"。For example, the spelling for an administrator in the enumeration is "Administrator", not "Administrators". 使用此重载时, 使用下表中的角色拼写。When using this overload, use the spelling for the role from the following table. |内置本地组Built-in local groups| |----------------------------| |BUILTIN\AdministratorsBUILTIN\Administrators| |BUILTIN\UsersBUILTIN\Users| |BUILTIN\GuestsBUILTIN\Guests| |BUILTIN\Account 运算符BUILTIN\Account Operators| |BUILTIN\Server 运算符BUILTIN\Server Operators| |BUILTIN\Print 运算符BUILTIN\Print Operators| |BUILTIN\Backup 运算符BUILTIN\Backup Operators| |BUILTIN\ReplicatorBUILTIN\Replicator| 对于计算机特定的角色, `role`字符串应采用 "MachineName\\RoleNameHere" 格式。For machine-specific roles, the `role` string should be in the form "MachineName\\*RoleNameHere*". 对于域特定的角色, `role`字符串应采用 "DomainName `"SomeDomain\Domain Users`\\RoleNameHere" 形式; 例如, ""。For domain-specific roles, the `role` string should be in the form "DomainName\\*RoleNameHere*"; for example, `"SomeDomain\Domain Users`". > [!NOTE] > 在 .NET Framework 版本1.0 中, `role`参数区分大小写。In the .NET Framework version 1.0, the `role` parameter is case-sensitive. 在 .NET Framework 版本1.1 及更高版本中`role` , 参数不区分大小写。In the .NET Framework version 1.1 and later, the `role` parameter is case-insensitive. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示方法的用法。The following code example demonstrates the use of the method. 字符串`BUILTIN\Administrators` 和`BUILTIN\Users`用于确定当前主体是否是管理员或用户。The strings `BUILTIN\Administrators` and `BUILTIN\Users` are used to determine whether the current principal is an administrator or a user. 有关完整的代码示例, 请参见方法。For the full code example, see the method.
